OOC : Remus will try to defend the matrix.

BIC: As the Matrix flowned from=
 Rodimus's core to Cyclonyus, a painful
scream could be heard from Remus. I=
t was if Cyclonus was draining a
part of Remus's core at the same time. Rem=
us couldn't stand it anymore
. The heroic figth of Rodimus may have corrupt=
 the futur. But it
wasn't is fault. The only one's to blame was Remus: onle=
 he had known
what was at sake. He had to stop Cyclonus.

Has he dashed tow=
ard Cyclonus, the golden glow from his eyes was
iradiating from all his bod=
y. He was trying to separated Cyclonus from
the Matrix helder, since any fi=
re could be even more desastrous.

not quite

Cyclonus

k

=

eld within, but Cyclonus knew that there was another way.

yclonus approached Rodimus, hands held before him, fingers

is palms his hand cannons seemed to almost retract or

 twin black holes, the same feature he displayed

 battle when he absorbed the energy of the

ack receptors were to put to a much

odimus' chest Cyclonus prepared

ing the receptors, and then

!

d

> =
hands on Rodimus' chest. A grim look apeared on Cyclonus face as he
> stare=
d into the optics of the defeated Rodimus, for the briefest moment
> a stra=
nge look appeared on Cyclonus' face, Triumph? Remorse? It was

 it could be identified. What repalced it was a steel mask

the powerful Unicron herald began to leech the power of

odimus Prime's chest!
